name: Ribbon Communications Inc.
description: Ribbon Communications Inc. is a leading global provider of communications technology and software solutions for service providers, enterprises, and government agencies. Founded in 2017 through the merger of Genband and Sonus Networks, Ribbon specializes in real-time communications, providing innovative solutions that enable seamless connectivity, collaboration, and secure communications across various platforms. The company offers a wide range of products, including session border controllers, analytics, and cloud-native software that facilitate voice, video, and messaging services. Ribbon's solutions are designed to enhance network security and reliability, making them essential for businesses looking to transition to next-generation communication systems. The company is committed to delivering cutting-edge technology that supports the digital transformation and operational efficiency of its customers. With a strong presence in over 100 countries, Ribbon is dedicated to helping organizations leverage the power of cloud and IP communications to improve customer engagement and drive business growth.
